pr_title: feat(ProjectReleaseRelation): Added new Field comment, createdOn, createdBy in ProjectReleaseRelation

timeline.bodyText:
if (!textarea) make more sense here.
same applies to... if (!$(textarea)[0])

akapti

timeline.bodyText: please get this map project.getReleaseIdToUsage() once and store in variable, rather than fetching it each time in line 416, 417, 424, 433 and 445.
timeline.author: akapti

timeline.bodyText: No need to define a variable, we can directly pass empty string in method call (line 1428).
timeline.author: akapti

timeline.bodyText:
please use braces as there are more than one statement inside if clause.
Same applies to if clause in line 437.
timeline.author: akapti

timeline.message:
feat(ProjectReleaseRelation): Added new Field comment, createdOn, createdBy in ProjectReleaseRelation
  * comment field is available in UI, REST and Excel
  * createdOn , createdBy is not available in UI but available in REST and Excel.

Signed-off-by: Jaideep Palit <jaideep.palit@siemens.com>
